title: Under the Desert Sky
description: In this Dateline classic, the murder of a Nevada teenager shakes the community to its core when the two most unlikely people make a shocking confession. Keith Morrison reports. Originally aired on NBC on January 4, 2013.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
